WINDOWS CURL COMMANDS FOR PAYMENT STATUS ENDPOINT
================================================

Option 1: PowerShell (Recommended)
----------------------------------
$headers = @{
    "Content-Type" = "application/json"
    "Authorization" = "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.._VDUu3iLcWGP9jeTMuH4NINm1ejjZykLaxVLz6NRhWE"
}

$body = @{
    "f000" = "mtnmomorwa"
    "f001" = "SERVICE"
    "f002" = "collection"
    "f003" = "U8EQDpo2"
    "f004" = 5000
    "f005" = "+250788123456"
    "f006" = "john_doe"
    "f007" = "encrypted_pwd_123"
    "f008" = "mypassword"
    "f009" = "mobile_app_v1"
    "f010" = "txn_20250903_002"
} | ConvertTo-Json

Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "http://localhost:5000/api/v1/payment/status" -Method POST -Headers $headers -Body $body

Option 2: Windows curl (if available)
-------------------------------------
curl -X POST "http://localhost:5000/api/v1/payment/status" ^
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" ^
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.._VDUu3iLcWGP9jeTMuH4NINm1ejjZykLaxVLz6NRhWE" ^
  -d "{\"f000\":\"mtnmomorwa\",\"f001\":\"SERVICE\",\"f002\":\"collection\",\"f003\":\"U8EQDpo2\",\"f004\":5000,\"f005\":\"+250788123456\",\"f006\":\"john_doe\",\"f007\":\"encrypted_pwd_123\",\"f008\":\"mypassword\",\"f009\":\"mobile_app_v1\",\"f010\":\"txn_20250903_002\"}"

Option 3: Python (Easiest)
--------------------------
python test_windows_curl.py

RESULT: The endpoint is working! The 500 error is expected because the PostgreSQL function doesn't exist yet.
The system will automatically create a default function when needed.
